# Assignment

Hello, this is my assignment.


```{r}
#| fig-cap: "Fuel mileage scatterplot"
#| label: plot-1

mpg |>
  ggplot(aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(
    title = "How does engine size affect highway mileage?",
    x = "Engine size (displacement in liters)",
    y = "Highway fuel mileage (miles per gallon)"
  )
```
